channel.title: Compile error
channel.description:
hi there, when i compile my server i get this error;
[code]client.java:17204: cannot find symbol symbol : variable TheifTimer location: class client if(TheifTimer == 0) { ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
its when i was trying to add some thieving stalls, but i get that error, someone help please
thanks

found it thanks everyone.

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

Yeah i did that, im now back to step 1:

[code]client.java:17204: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable TheifTimer
location: class client
if(TheifTimer == 0) {
^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

:([br][br][size=1]Posted on: [/size][hr]Not sure if this will help but just incase it does;
Client.java

[code]public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

if(TheifTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
setAnimation(emote);
sM("You steal from the "+stallName);
sM(message);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
int TheifTimer = 0;
}
else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
sM(“You need a theiving level of “+lvlReq+” to theif from this stall.”);[/code]

Read full topic

[quote=“Snaz, post:4, topic:306295”]client.java:17204: illegal start of expression if(TheifTimer == 0)) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

what do you mean by declared? never heard of the word :[/quote]

Remove the extra bracket )
